transcript.speaker: speaker1
transcript.content: Hey Adam, it's great to meet you.

transcript.speaker: speaker2
transcript.content: Thanks John, great to meet you as well.  Where are you calling in from?

transcript.speaker: speaker1
transcript.content: I'm calling in from Atlanta.  Are we ready to get started or are we waiting on more folks from Tonic to join?

transcript.speaker: speaker2
transcript.content: I think we can get going.  I was hoping Ian would be here but he must be running late.

transcript.speaker: speaker1
transcript.content: Sounds good.  Let me get my screen shared and we can get going.
